data.title: Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes' daughter all grown up and going to college
data.meta_description: The daughter of former Hollywood couple Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes is becoming a college kid
data.text:
As Suri Cruise is all grown up now and going to college, we're taking a look back at her life as the daughter of former Hollywood couple Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes.

While Suri has no public social media accounts and has been shielded from the spotlight by her famous A-list parents, fans are captivated by Suri's life and future endeavors. Despite her low profile, fans have still caught glimpses of Suri growing up,from her "spiritual" birth in 2006, navigating her parents' infamous divorce and dropping her dad's famous last name.

Many have been interested in Suri's family's dynamic as she and her father are known to have a strained relationship following her parents' public split. And as Suri made the move to legally switch her name to Suri Noelle ahead of attending Carnegie Mellon University in the fall, many believe she is trying to cut ties with her famous father.

Click here to follow the Mirror US on Google News to stay up to date with all the latest news, sport and entertainment stories.
